info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:12AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Beauregard and central Allen Parishes through 345 AM CST... At 311 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ragley, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oberlin, Reeves, Dry Creek, Mittie, Ragley, Grant, Harmony and Leblanc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
